mapper.select: SELECT qno,qsubject,name,qregdate,qhit,group_tab,num FROM (SELECT qno,qsubject,name,qregdate,qhit,group_tab,Rownum as num FROM(SELECT qno,qsubject,name,qregdate,qhit,group_tab FROM qna, member WHERE qna.no=member.no ORDER BY group_id DESC,group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(qno)+1,1) as no FROM qna
INSERT INTO qna(qno,qsubject,qcontent,no,group_id) VALUES(#{qno},#{qsubject},#{qcontent},#{no}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM qna))
